about_the_game:
History, Truth, Dreams

In the heart of an isolated island, a deserted camp sets the stage for a mysterious military mission.
A team of 8 soldiers arrive for this mission. During the first days of training for the mission, Soldier Basel sustains a serious injury that leads him to a prolonged coma. Upon awakening, he discovers a startling reality – all those in the camp have vanished, leaving behind a trail of enigmatic secrets.

Embark on the journey, piece together the mystery, uncover the secrets surrounding the mysterious disappearance of the other soldiers, and discover the secrets of the mysterious mission.

  • Psychological Horror: Encounter psychological horror elements that go beyond jump scares. Be prepared for a storyline that twists and turns, leaving you questioning reality and adding a unique psychological depth to the gaming experience.
  • Stunning Graphics: Tangles boasts high-quality graphics that bring the mysterious island and its secrets to life. Explore the detailed environment as you unravel the mysteries that shroud the camp.
  • Hidden Secrets: The adventure doesn't end with the main storyline. Engage in optional side missions after completing the game to discover five hidden secret documents scattered throughout the camp. Each document provides unique insights into the island's history and geography.

Engage with the intricate storyline, solve puzzles, and unravel the twisted events that await you on the mysterious island.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content and materials not recommended for children, such as disturbing images, scenes of explicit violence and gore, flashing lights, loud noises, and some jumpscares!

name: Tangles - تشابك

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Six-Core Xeon E5-2643 @ 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews:
“Tangles manages to deliver a gripping psychological horror experience that leaves a lasting impression. Fans of the genre will appreciate the game's free-to-play approach, impressive graphics, and the unsettling atmosphere created by the mysterious narrative. Although short-lived, Tangles is a worthwhile venture into the realm of psychological horror, earning a solid 8 out of 10.”
8 – Gaming Couch Potato
short_description: Awakening from a long coma following a training injury, Soldier Basel finds himself alone in an isolated camp on a deserted island surrounded by questions and mystery. He begins to search for answers to uncover the secrets, and whether they are painful truths or terrifying illusions.
supported_languages:
English*, Arabic, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, French, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
